name: World Shift
description:
Submission in the Unreal Mega Jam 2022 - As Above, So Below.

Solo - all assets aside from SFX were made during the jam. 
SFX sourced from Sound Snap.

A short, mind-bending puzzle game that has you shift between dimensions to restore an imbalance in a power relay station. 

Controls: 
Mouse - Look
WASD - Move
E - Interact
TAB - World Shift
